protocol.text: RMA algorithm using RobinA software (PMID:22684630) ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA signal
Plants were treated in the darkness at 5% O2 v/v in air for 4h at 10am in the morning, 2h after the start of the day

Seeds were sown in 6-cm diameter pots containing moisted Arabidopsis soil. The seeds were stratified at 4ﾰC in the dark for 2 days and then the pots were moved in a growth chamber at short photoperiodic conditions (8h light 16 h darkness) with 18ﾰC in the night and 22ﾰC in the day.

Total RNA was extracted from whole 5-week old plants using the RNeasy kit (Qiagen). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry. RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix Arabidopsis Genome GeneChip arrays.
